law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Costs" means the cost of prosecuting a person for a crime.

section.section: "Crime" means any act or omission for which a statute or ordinance imposes a fine or imprisonment.
"Crime" does not include a municipal infraction under Article 23A, § 3 of the Code.
"Fine" means the monetary penalty prescribed by a statute or ordinance for a crime.
